description:
Don't be one of the those people who begins this wonderful hobby then loses motivation. Avoid the dreaded crafting burnout with tried and true advice from the crafting Dungeon Master himself...DM Scotty.

TOPICS COVERED:
-How to manage your crafting time to avoid burnout.

-The benefits of modular terrain.

-How specific should I get with terrain builds?

-Storage Woes and how to avoid them.

-Do I have to build every detail of a encounter?

-How much crafting is too much?

-How to cut corners on crafting time.

-How to avoid building too much.

-Dry erase and DM crafting.

-Practical shortcuts you can use in your terrain heavy games.

-Theater of the mind and tabletop terrain...do they mix?

To ease your terrain burden here are 2 double sided battle mats to set up your terrain on. My Amazon affiliate link: https://amzn.to/2AQjEdt
